details.title: B K Hariprasad arrives ahead of polls
details.content:
Opposition candidate for the Deputy Chairman of Rajya Sabha, B K Hariprasad arrives at the Parliament House. (Photo| Shekhar Yadav/ EPS)

He said he's very confident that they have the required numbers to sweep the polls.

details.title: AAP, PDP to abstain from voting
details.content: Three MPs from Aam Admi Party and Two MPs from People's Democratic Party are likely to abstain from voting in the Rajya Sabha Deputy Chairman polls.

details.title: Who are in race for second most important chair in Rajya Sabha?
details.content:
BK Hariprasad (left): The Congress led Opposition's candidate, BK Hariprasad is an MP from Karnataka. 

Harivansh Singh (right): The NDA government's candidate for second most important post in Rajya Sabha, Harivansh Narayan Singh is an MP from JD (U). He's a lawmaker from Bihar and a former journalist.

details.title: Arun Jaitley likely to be present today
details.content: Union Minister Arun Jaitley is likely to be present for today's Rajya Sabha Deputy Chairman election.

details.title: Harivansh Singh arrives at the Parliament house
details.content: BJP candidate for Deputy chairman of Rajya Sabha Harivansh Singh arrives at Parliament House. (Photo | Shekhar Yadav/ EPS)

details.title: BJP issues three line whip
details.content: BJP has issued a three line whip to its Rajya Sabha MPs to be present in the house today. (ANI)

details.title: Arun Jaitley arrives at the Parliament
details.content: Union Minister Arun Jaitley arrives at Parliament ahead of the election. (Photo | Shekhar Yadav/ EPS)

details.title: YSRC to abstain from voting
details.content: Two Mps of YSR Congress has decided to abstain from voting.We have decided to abstain from voting for Rajya Sabha Deputy Chairman elections. Both Congress and BJP have not fulfilled the promises made to Andhra Pradesh: V. Vijayasai Reddy,YSR Congress MP

details.title: Rajya Sabha reconvenes, polls shortly
details.content: Rajya Sabha Chairman Venkaiah Naidu begins House's proceedings by paying homage to the martyrs of Quit India Movement on it's 75th anniversary.
Lok Sabha adjourned amidst ruckus.

details.title: Voting underway
details.content: Rajya Sabha Deputy Chairman candidate are being announced.

details.title: Venkaiah Naidu asks to clear lobbies
details.content:
Lobbies being cleared in Rajya Sabha, division of votes for Rajya Sabha Deputy Chairman elections to begin shortly pic.twitter.com/32tgsIdrSE

— ANI (@ANI) August 9, 2018

details.title: Harivansh Singh sweeps polls
details.content: NDA's Harivansh Singh sweeps Deputy Chairman polls with 122 votes.

details.title: Rajya Sabha Venkaiah Naidu declares Harivansh Singh as the Deputy Chairman
details.content: JD(U) MP and NDA candidate Harivansh Narayan Singh elected as Rajya Sabha Deputy Chairman. He swept two rounds of the polls.

details.title: Gulam Navi Azad asks Deputy Chairman to not lean towards the government
details.content: Leader of the Opposition Gulam Navi Azad welcomes Union Minister Arun Jaitley to the Parlaiment and wished for his speedy recovery. He also congratulated the newly elected Deputy Chairman Harivansh Singh. I insist the Deputy Chairman to focus on the left-of-Center parties instead of leaning towards the right.

details.title: Prime Minister Narendra Modi felicitates Harivansh Singh
details.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi congratulates newly elect Deputy Chairman Harivansh Singh.

details.title: Leader of the House Arun Jaitley congratulates Harivansh Singh
details.content: Union Minister Arun Jaitley congratulates Harivansh Singh on his victory. He said,"whenever he spoke about anything, did complete research on the subject. And I hope he hold the position of Deputy Chairman with pride.

details.title: Here's a look at Harivansh Singh's Parliament journey
Tiruchi Siva mourns M Karunanidhi, Congratulates Harivansh Singh
details.content: Nothing should stand our way while carrying our duties. Though we are not relieved of the pain but we are here to perform our duties as M Karunanidhi would have liked. On behalf of the DMK party we congratulate Harivansh Singh. The Chair is extremely prestigious and I'd hope that the Chair doesn't tilt on either side: Tiruchi Siva, DMK.

details.title: Tiruchi Siva mourns M Karunanidhi, Congratulates Harivansh Singh
details.content: Nothing should stand our way while carrying our duties. Though we are not relieved of the pain but we are here to perform our duties as M Karunanidhi would have liked. On behalf of the DMK party we congratulate Harivansh Singh. The Chair is extremely prestigious and I'd hope that the Chair doesn't tilt on either side: Tiruchi Siva, DMK.

details.title: Prime Minister Narendra Modi thanks MPs for supporting Harivansh Singh
details.content:
I thank all the Rajya Sabha MPs who supported Shri Harivansh Ji. It is gladdening that he got support across party lines. pic.twitter.com/Sp7pYybG2r

— Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) August 9, 2018

details.title: Venkaiah Naidu praises members for smooth conduct of election
details.content: Chairman Venkaiah Naidu congratulates Rajya Sabha members for conducting the election in a smooth and dignified manner.
Lok Sabha adjourned till 1pm.

details.title: Rajya Sabha Deputy Chairman Harivansh Singh addresses the House
details.content: Harivansh Singh inspired by Jayprakash Narayan has decided to do away with his surname. He rose to thank Members for electing him. He welcomed suggestions and recomendations for smooth conduct of the House.He promised that he will fulfill his duties to the best of his abilities.

details.title: Venkaiah Naidu to host breakfast in honour of Deputy Chairman, South Indian food on the menu
details.content: Chairman Naidu will host breakfast tomorrow at 9 am to honour the new members of the house and the Deputy Chairman. The House stands adjourned to meet at 2pm.

details.title: All about Harivansh Narayan Singh, newly elected Rajya Sabha Deputy Chairman
details.content: Hailing from Sitab Diara village in Saran district of Bihar, the newly elected deputy chairman of Rajya Sabha, Harivansh Narayan Singh, was born on June 30, 1956. Read More

details.title: Rajya Sabha resumes, SC/ ST Bill tabled
details.content: Minister of State Thaawar Chand Gehlot initiates the debate on SC/ST (Prevention of Atrocities) Amendment Bill.

details.title: Piyush Goyal takes up GST Amendment Bill in Lok Sabha
details.content: In Lok Sabha, Finance Minister Piyush Goyal introduces the Bills to amend the GST (Compensation to States), the IGST and the CGST laws for consideration and passing.

details.title: Kumari Shelja questions government's stand on Dalits
details.content: Congress member from Haryana Kumari Shelja says,"Every 15 minutes, one crime takes place against Dalits. BJP ruled states record for highest number of crimes against Dalits with lowest conviction rate".

details.title: Rajya Sabha adjourned for 10 minutes
details.content: The Upper House has been adjourned to meet after 10 minutes.
Rajya Sabha resumes, discussion on SC/ST bill underway.
Rajya Sabha resumes, discussion on SC/ST bill underway.
Rajya Sabha passes the Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes (Prevention of Atrocities) Amendment Bill, 2018.

Congress leader Mallikarjun Kharge raises questions on Rafale deal amid ruckus in Lok Sabha

Kharge makes speech amid loud ruckus. He targetted the Modi government over the Rafale deal asking, "Who authorised PM to go ahead with the Rafale deal without consulting the Cabinet, the Defence secretary, and the CIC."
National Sports University bill is taken up for discussion in Rajya Sabha.
Several Rajya Sabha MPs shout slogans on Rafale deal, demanding for a Joint Parliamentary Committee on the issue, in the well of the house.

BJP MP Bhabananda Singh highlights the importance of sports and provides examples of sports achievers from Manipur, saying he supports the bill. The chanting by members in the well of the house continues even as he speaks.
Indian boxing star and Rajya Sabha nominated MP, MC Mary Kom speaks in Rajya Sabha on the National Sports University bill, 2018.

Rajya Sabha Chairman Venkaiah Naidu appeals for silence to let Mary Kom's voice be heard. He stresses that this is not the way to treat an Olympian. However, the MPs do not refrain from shouting slogans.
Lok Sabha TRS MP Konda Vishweshwar Reddy speaks on amendments to the GST bill. He points out that there are ambiguities in the allocation of different GST rates to different products.
Lok Sabha MPs raise issue of petrol and diesel price hike during discussion of amendments to the GST bill.
Rajya Sabha passes the National Sports University bill, 2018, after overwhelming support.
The Homeopathy Central Council (Amendment) Bill, 2018 taken up for discussion in Rajya Sabha.
The Rajya Sabha MPs in the well of the house continue to shout slogans on Rafale deal.

As the Homeopathy Central Council (Amendment) bill, 2018 is discussed, opposition MPs persistently raise slogans on Rafale deal, drowning the speaker's voice. Repeated requests by the Chairman does not stop the shouting.
The Homeopathy Central Council (Amendment) Bill, 2018 is passed in the Rajya Sabha.
Persistent commotion forces Chairman Venkaiah Naidu to adjourn the house till 11 am, August 10, 2018.
Discussion on the Representation of the People (Amendment) Bill, 2017 is underway in the Lok Sabha. The session has been extended till 7 pm.
READ FULL REPORT | GST on more items to be slashed if revenue increases: Piyush Goyal in Lok Sabha

details.title: Lok Sabha passes four GST-related bills
details.content:
Lok Sabha has passed:

  1. Central Goods and Services Tax (Amendment) Bill, 2018

  2. Integrated Goods and Services Tax (Amendment) Bill, 2018

  3. Union Territory Goods and Services Tax (Amendment) Bill, 2018

  4. Goods and Services Tax (Compensation to states) Amendment Bill, 2018
Discussing the Representation of the People (Amendment) Bill, 2017, Lok Sabha MPs debate the right to vote for NRIs, proxy-voting, and e-voting.
Lok Sabha passes the Representation of People (Amendment) Bill, 2018.

CPI(M) Lok Sabha MP P Karunakaran raises the issue of heavy rains wreaking havoc in Kerala.

READ | Flood situation 'grave' in Kerala, says CM Vijayan; toll rises to 22
Lok Sabha adjourned till 11 am on August 10.
Lok Sabha adjourned till 11 am on August 10, 2018.
